verbs.description: If [ARG1: you] [V: were] [ARG2: lucky enough to get your hands on one of the Donald Trump / Supreme Leader commemorative meeting coins] , now is the time to hold it close . Because it just became so much more emblematic of the events of this White House — overblown , gold - plated , ...
